basic_information.scholarship_name: Milt and Shirley Pugh Endowed Scholarship (CMS)

description: Scholarship Mission: To provide scholarship assistance to students within the College of Mathematics and Science and/or the College of Liberal Arts. This fund is established as an honorarium of the following former faculty of the University: Marvin Evans, Beverly Cox, C.E. Herring, Gerlof Homan, Fred Drake, Vera Mayor, and Norman Russell. Eligibility Requirements College of Mathematics and Science Minimum GPA of 2.5 Demonstrated financial need Candidate should be full-time and in good standing Provide two faculty recommendations Provide current transcript

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
criteria.raw_text: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"

criteria.description: SIS_College is Mathematics and Science   or SIS_College is College of Math and Science   or SIS_College is Mathematics and Science   or SIS_College_2 is Mathematics and Science   or SIS_College_2 is College of Math and Science   or SIS_College_2 is Mathematics and Science
